[[File:Harpy_Portrait.png|255px|thumb|right|Xiadani Stormfeather's in-game portrait]]Xiadani Stormfeather is a harpy [[Trader]] and Wandering Merchant.

She is the fifth and last Trader you can unlock by leveling, at [[Level]] 15. Xiadani Stormfeather can only come to your settlement once you hit 66 City score.
